name: ziit
description: Ziit is a self-hosted link-in-bio and profile page generator. It lets users collect links, social profiles, and content into a single customizable landing page hosted on their own infrastructure.

features.title: Data Import
features.description: Collect all your important links, social profiles, and content in one customizable landing page

features.title: Theme Customization
features.description: Personalize your profile page with colors, fonts, and layouts that match your personal brand

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Monitor link clicks and visitor statistics to understand which content resonates with your audience

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Display links to Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn, and other social platforms with recognizable icons

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Add images, videos, and embedded content alongside text links for engaging presentations
